Where Every Pic Is A Dick Pic

About

As a kid I hated to be called Dick, 'cause kids were NOT saying it as a short for Richard, they meant it like the appendage. Now here I am 26 years later not coming to you as Richard, but fuckin' Dick! And that's alright 'cause over the years I've realized everyones day is better with a lil' Dick in their lives. Be it morning, noon or night you can visit my site to get some Dick in your life to make you feel alright.

By now you have probably gathered that my name is Richard aka Dick. I am a Bay Area native and one of my many hobbies is taking pictures of things. Growing up I was kinda poor and photography can be an expensive hobby, but with the advent of digital cameras I am allowed a little more freedom. Even though this Dick shoots RAW my memory card can enough until I get home to dump a load on to the PC. These may not be the money shots, but they are still Dick pics. Enjoy.
